text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Oh boy the U.S. is the winner in the covid-19 Olympics to bad tens of thousands of US citizens aren't alive while Dumpster chief takes credit for the most tested, not the most saved lives, FSMH you press secretary are a bung tonguer, save us your BS
